# lowLevelMesh

**Instance Property**

The low-level mesh that this mesh is built from, if any.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var lowLevelMesh: LowLevelMesh? { get }
```

## Discussion

If this mesh is not built from a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/LowLevelMesh], it returns nil.
title: lowLevelMesh
